channel.title: Which Source...?
channel.description:
Ok I am VERY MAD RIGHT NOW..
My whole F****** source was deleted by a virus because I had to backtrack my computer a month..
So I am pretty experienced now and I am restarting... From scratch... All over....
I do not like cheezscape 80 because it's summoning stinks... I can delete it easily but it still has some weird stuff and I don't like how Xero made A lot of stuff into cases... (EX: Such as clicking on objects...)
I like Testscape and I used it for my source.
So help me out... :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Why dont you code the server from scratch? Then you can make it as customized as you want.

Sure it make take a few years… but still.

Like 5 years max right?

item.description:
@loler wrote:

Im a fan of testscape, its easily changable, and comes with alot of features, and commands, If your Pretty experienced youll love it, so Do what you can, play around, and youll get the result your after, Gl,
